title: Recordings in Lufthansa Trial Portray an Aging Gangster With Little Money or Power
text:
Published By: NYTimes NY Region - Today 
Audio recordings of Vincent Asaro, who is on trial for the theft of $6 million in cash and jewelry from a Kennedy Airport terminal in 1978, ...
